Gather Data: Conduct employee surveys, interviews, and focus groups to understand the current corporate culture. Identify existing strengths and areas needing improvement related to ownership, systems thinking, and customer focus.

Assess Leadership: Evaluate the existing leadership style and their adherence to unity of purpose, consistent vision, and clarity of intent principles.

Analyze Maslowâ€™s Hierarchy: Assess where employees stand on the hierarchy of needs. Identify if basic needs are met and focus on the higher-order needs like belonging, esteem, and self-actualization.
